import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FaArrowRight, FaStar, FaClock, FaShieldAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Home = () => { const [featuredProduct, setFeaturedProduct] = useState(null); // Fetch products for the collection preview const { data: products, isLoading } = useQuery( 'homeProducts', async () => { const response = await axios.get('/api/products?limit=6'); return response.data.data; }, { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes } ); useEffect(() => { if (products && products.length > 0) { // Set the first product as featured setFeaturedProduct(products[0]); } }, [products]); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Safe & Secure', description: 'All equipment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized before each rental.' }, { icon: , title: 'Flexible Rental', description: 'Choose your rental duration from 1 day to several weeks.' }, { icon: , title: 'Quality Equipment', description: 'Premium quality mini drafters and lab aprons for your needs.' } ]; if (isLoading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Left side - Content */}

Campus Equipment Rental Made Easy

Rent high-quality mini drafters and lab aprons for your academic needs. Convenient, affordable, and reliable equipment rental service.

Browse Collection Learn More
{/* Stats */}
500+
Happy Students
50+
Equipment Items
24/7
Support
{/* Right side - Featured Product */}
{featuredProduct && (
📐

{featuredProduct.name}

{featuredProduct.description.substring(0, 100)}...

₹{featuredProduct.pricePerDay}/day
View Details
)}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Campus Connect?

We provide the best rental experience with quality equipment and excellent service.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Products Preview Section */}

Our Products

Browse our collection of high-quality mini drafters and lab aprons.

{products && products.length > 0 && (
{products.slice(0, 6).map((product) => (
{product.category === 'mini-drafter' ? 'Mini Drafter' : 'Lab Apron'} {product.availableQuantity} available

{product.name}

{product.description}

₹{product.pricePerDay}/day View Details
))}
)}
View All Products
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of students who trust Campus Connect for their equipment rental needs.

Sign Up Now Contact Us
); }; export default Home;
